title: Under Armour Men's Team's Armour Polo Golf Shirt, 1246240 (Royal, S)
features: Lightweight, textured fabric for durability and style.
Moisture Transport System wicks sweat away from the body.
description: HeatGear moisture transport ensures lightweight performance and long lasting comfort with 50+ UPF that protects your skin from the sun's harmful rays and inhibits premature aging. ArmourStretch improves mobility and accelerates dry time with lightweight fabrics built in a 4-way stretch. Technology prevents the growth of odor causing substances. Ribbed collar and custom Under Armour three-button placket. Textured fabric is durable and light and that makes the Under Armour Every Team's Armour Men's Polo a great choice.
